preclusion: Students who have passed PC3235 OR PC2133 are not allowed to take PC3235B.
description: The module covers fundamental solid state physics concepts (crystal structure, reciprocal lattice, free electron theory) and the physical properties of metals, electrons in periodic potentials, and basic semiconductor physics Doping, p-n junctions, crystal defects, diffusion processes, energy bands of the nearly free electron model, tight binding approximations, Fermi surfaces and their experimental determination, optical processes, piezoelectricity, basic ideas of magnetism.
title: Applied Solid State Physics
prerequisite: Students who have passed PC1144 or PC1433 or PC1101 or ESP1111.
